column4: i just updated my ati driver and everything works great except my login screen the resolution on it is wonky. i can log in but only see about 40% of the screen
retype first you gotta install your graphic card driver
then you gotta decide if you want to use beryl or compiz. google is your friend. no howto works for everyone's system you gotta do a little work
i have it installed, i have a dell, my x driver is i810
